title: Election year: electing Australia's federal parliament
creator_credit: Martin Cohen, Peter Johnson and Film Australia
brief_description: In showing the conduct of a federal election this film shows how electoral boundaries are fixed, how candidates for election are selected by the political parties and also how votes are counted in elections for both the senate and the representatives
creator_credit_for_label: Martin Cohen, Peter Johnson and Film Australia
